reviews.customers_say: Customers find the tunic dress chic and versatile, able to be dressed up or down, with a nice fit that accommodates various body types. They appreciate its comfort, soft material, and color options, with one customer highlighting its dramatic black and white dye effect. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising the fabric while others note it wasn't as expected. Size opinions are also mixed, with some finding it roomy while others say it's too big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm naturally a 1X but I love to wear my tunics longer
items.body: I'm naturally a 1X but I love to wear my tunics longer, almost like a dress to pair with many different pants. I love the one size in these tops because they fit like a 3X which is perfect. I ordered white, black and the sleeved teal one. The colors are fantastic and I get tons of compliments everywhere I go when I wear them. I wash them on the gentle cycle on cold then I flatten them out before line drying them so they don't get wrinkled and free of static electricity so they don't stick to pants. They also keep their shape and color after being washed after so many times. They are even great, cool, and comfortable no matter the color in the 100 plus weather that I live in. I love the bohemian style so you can really dress them up or go casual. The punk rocker style is really fun with these tunics too. I very highly recommend these in every color which is why I'm going to order more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Sue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality top that garnished many compliments in one night!
items.body: Wow, this is a beautiful top, and I don't remember getting this many compliments on an outfit in a long time! The material seems to be of the highest quality too. It felt heavy, but it really wasn't. I'm going to order it in some other colors too. Read more
items.author: C. Edwards

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for all seasons.
items.body: I purchased 2 of these in the same style, different colors, from different sellers. Dispite very varied reviews, they are the exact same thing, so don't be afraid to shop around for the color or price you want. One is slightly shorter than the other, but in millimeters, perhaps. I really do like them... They are flowy, super soft and comfortable, cool, and great for hiding flaws - while still feeling feminine and dressy. It is definitely a top though IMO. Not a dress as some sellers or pictures advertise. Maybe if you are 4' 11" and live in a place with zero wind, you could do it... Or if you just want to use it as a swimsuit cover up. Otherwise, wear something underneath. Cute with a skirt, jeans, leggings, etc. for layering and all seasons. I took a star away for a couple reasons, even though I am happy with these. The arm holes are a little too gaping. If you don't have a shirt underneath, you might be showing more than you intend when you move around. I stitched mine a little smaller so I could wear them in Summer without a top underneath. The neck will work for cold-shoulder look, but not really big enough to stay in place. I like it fine as just a boat neck style, but again, you could alter it a little if you can work scissors and needle/thread. I wish it were 100% rayon without the spandex. I think spandex just clings too much and this is plenty large enough that it doesn't really need the stretchiness. I have a similar style that is rayon and chiffon and I adore that one. I do wish they had more printed/designed versions of these, but all in all, satisfied with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Girl Interrupted

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for parties
items.body: Itâ€™s heavy enough for winter wear(I bought long sleeve), worn w leggings you can dress it up or down. Iâ€™m very pleased, plenty of room, I wear xl, super comfortable. Iâ€™ve washed, cold water w like colors, hang dry, itâ€™s done beautifully. No smell detected. Read more

items.author: KS

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for me
items.body: This looked really cute in the pictures, but when I tried it on, it just looked like a bunch of fabric. The color was true to the photos and it felt nice and soft. However, it didn't drape well on me at all and made me look kind of like a fire hydrant. lol (I'm short.) It's probably great on a taller person, but I had to return it. Read more
items.author: Jeri

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Like really HOT guys that swear they are Gods in Bed, this too will DISAPPOINT in every way....
items.body: IF IT WAS OPPISITE DAY WHEN THE DESCRIPTION WAS WRITTEN, THEN THEY DID A GREAT JOB. THIS IS NOT. NOT. NOT... NOT THE RIGHT SIZE, COLOR, OR OFF THE SHOULDER, ITS EVERYTHING ITS NOT SUPPOSE TO BE AND NOTHING I HOPED IT WAS, KIND OF FEEL LIKE THIS WAS A BAD RELATIONSHIP. I AM LEFT WITH LITTLE TRUST, ALOT OF QUESTIONS, PROMISES NEVER KEPT AND LEFT ALONE TO CLEAN UP THE MESS.... I was really expecting a lot more out of this shirt (NOT DRESS.) First off I wear a size XL normally in tops 14-16 on bottom. I am 5'1" and 170 pounds. First thing I noticed is that this is NOT the color in the picture. In the picture it shows a pinkish, taupe color that is called apricot on other sites that it is listed under, not tan, not brown, not mocha or whatever I got..... It is NOT long enough to be a dress even on me and I can barely reach the bottom of most washers to get my clothes out... It is NOT an off the shoulder top like pictured, but I did find that if you stretch that opening gently as not to rip it but firmly tugging, you can stretch it too be off the shoulder. This material though very comfortable, it seems to attract dirt, food, drinks... ANYTHING and EVERYTHING shows A LOT on it. A drip of water showed for over an hour on this, my daughter gave me a hug and BAM! I had some oily looking stain on the breast immediately even though I was getting her dressed from her bath time. The length on the sides does come to right at my knee and the shortest area does barely cover my torso and tummy so I decided to keep it because lets face it, returns and waiting for a replacement or money back is much more anxiety inducing then the stain magnet I just bought. I will be researching a way to demagnetize this poncho, maybe scotch guard? IDK. If you know a way please let me in on it because I really do not think I could even go to the mailbox and back without finding at east 2-3 new "stains" which make me look more like a toddler with ADHD drinking red wine out of a leaky sippy whilst trying to walk after getting off the Merry Go Round at the park.... Yeah, it's that bad... I need a bib for my bib shaped shirt now... So Sad Read more
items.author: Marnie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Viscastle womenâ€™s top.
items.body: The item is too large and I would to return it, Read more
items.author: Hattie Hedgepeth

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Pink, Yellow, Royal Blue, Peach-long, Black, Orange, Blk-long Sleeve. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
